Plot forecast accuracy metrics

Source: R/plot_error_metrics.R
plot_error_metrics.Rd

Plot forecast accuracy metrics, either along the forecast horizon or the slices.

plot_error_metrics(
  data,
  title = NULL,
  subtitle = NULL,
  ylab = NULL,
  xlab = NULL,
  caption = NULL,
  line_width = 1,
  line_type = "solid",
  point_size = 0,
  point_alpha = 1,
  theme_set = theme_tscv(),
  theme_config = list(),
  ...
)

Arguments

data

A tibble containing the accuracy metrics, i.e. the result of a call to error_metrics().
title

Title for the plot.
subtitle

Subtitle for the plot.
ylab

Label for the y-axis.
xlab

Label for the x-axis.
caption

Caption (footnote) for the plot.
line_width

Numeric value. Line width.
line_type

Character value defining the line type.
point_size

Numeric value. Point size.
point_alpha

Numeric value between 0 and 1. The transparency of the points.
theme_set

A complete ggplot2 theme.
theme_config

A list with further arguments passed to ggplot2::theme().
...

Further arguments passed to ggplot2::geom_line() or ggplot2::geom_point().
point_shape

Integer value. Point shape.

Value

p An object of class ggplot.
